mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comp(bno, writer, title, content, thumb_img, money, homesize, place, room, imgs, usernum) VALUES(myhome_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{thumbImg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{homeSize, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{place, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{room, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgs, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT profile FROM users WHERE nick_name=#{writer}
mapper.update: UPDATE comp SET like_cnt=like_cnt+#{likeCnt}, scrap_cnt=scrap_cnt+ #{scrapCnt} WHERE bno=#{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT scrap FROM users WHERE nick_name=#{writer}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET scrap=#{scrap} WHERE nick_name=#{writer}
UPDATE comp SET view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 WHERE bno=#{bno}
UPDATE myhome SET scrap_cnt = scrap_cnt + #{num} WHERE bno=#{bno}
